title: Client
content:
Client

Contains all functions needed for invoking Supabase function

Client.invokeRaw invokeRaw Client.invoke invoke Client.updateBearer updateBearer

title: Client.invokeRaw
content:
Client.invokeRaw invokeRaw

Invokes edge function with given name and optional body and returns result in

title: Client.invoke
content:
Client.invoke invoke

Invokes edge function with given name and optional body and returns result deserialized to given 'T type

title: Client.updateBearer
content:
Client.updateBearer updateBearer

Updates Bearer token in connection Header and returns new FunctionsConnection
